articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Partiful is Google’s ‘best app’ of 2024 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Partiful, the New York-based event-planning app that's taking on older solutions like Evite, Eventbrite, and Facebook Events, has been named Google's app
articles.content: Partiful, the New York-based event-planning app that’s taking on older solutions like Evite, Eventbrite, and Facebook Events, has been named Google’s app of the year, the tech giant announced on Mond… [+2411 chars]
